xdsl_access_dslam_reset_really: Are you sure you want to reset your connection port?
xdsl_access_dslam_reset_description:
This feature allows you to reboot the connection port of your line where it is connected to the DSLAM.
 Important! Your connection will be interrupted for a few minutes.
xdsl_access_dslam_reset_warning: Important! Your connection will be interrupted for a few minutes.
